### Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) describes how Lucid Software Inc. (“Lucid,”
“we,” or “us”) collects, uses and discloses your personal information.

This
Policy applies to information we collect when you use our websites, mobile

Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect and use information from and about
you when you visit our website, create an account with us, or otherwise
interact with us.

### Applicant Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy describes how Lucid collects and uses personal information
about you during our application and recruitment process for new employees.
